text: ninnalkku tannittillatta cila sekaryannal nam avarkk nalkiyirunnu. avarkku nam kelviyum kalcayum bud'dhiyumeki. ennal a kelviyea kalcayea bud'dhiyea avarkk ottum upakariccilla. karanam, avar allahuvinre vacanannale nisedhiccu tallukayayirunnu. annane avar etineyanea parihasiccukeantirunnat atavare valayam ceytu
